snippet.title: MATR1X FIRE—The first mobile shooting game in metaverse
snippet.description:
Matr1x FIRE is the first mobile shooting game in the Metaverse, and also the first game in the Matr1x platform. You can team up to experience classic yet innovative 5V5 shooting battles in the Cyberpunk world.

What's more, you can combat to win NFTs and digital art assets with great appreciation potential, such as Avatars, Weapons, PFPs, Gloves and other props. You can also join the Matr1x DAO to create your own NFTs！

Matr1x FIRE will be the gateway to Metaverse for 1 billion shooting game players! Take your firearms and fight for Individual Digital Sovereignty!

join our conmmunity
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Matr1xOfficial
Discord:https://discord.gg/matr1x
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Matr1xofficial
Medium:https://medium.com/@Matr1x_Official
Substack: https://matr1xdao.substack.com
Youtube:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGdbZiodUNfXUohlffb-b4Q
